Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.comicIds: The list of comic IDs to burn.
params.comicValues: Number of comics to burn, nth value means the number of nth comics(tokenId = n) to burn.

params.comicIds: The list of comic IDs to burn.
params.comicValues: Number of comics to burn, nth value means the number of nth comics(tokenId = n) to burn.
params.deadline: The deadline timestamp for the permit signature.

params.comicIds: The list of comic IDs to burn.
params.comicValues: Number of comics to burn, nth value means the number of nth comics(tokenId = n) to burn.
params.deadline: The deadline timestamp for the permit signature.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

burnComics(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Burns comic page(s) with prior approval to receive items associated with each page in return.

burnComicsForWithPermit(address,uint256[.notice: Burns comic page(s) on behalf of owner to provide items associated with each page in return.

burnComicsWithPermit(uint256[],uint256[].notice: Burns comic page(s) without prior approval to receive items associated with each page in return.
